name: Crysto
description:
Fly through blocky maps, avoid obstacles and colloct crystos, seems easy enough :)

This is my first game and it was made on my phone so its not the best, but please try it out

Description:

- 20 levels

- boss fight ( 2 actually )

- different skins

- offline

- ranks!!!,  try to get the highest

- not so good art ( made  by me ;) )

Hope u like it, future update coming soon.

And pls give suggestions but not critical
